title: COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1040/95 of 10 May 1995 laying down further transitional measures for the management of base areas in Spain
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1040/95 of  10 May 1995 laying down further transitional measures for the management of base areas in Spain
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In the marketing year 1994/95, Article 2 (6) of Regulation (EEC) No  1765/92 shall not apply in respect of the area planted with cereals, proteins, linseed, the related  compulsory set-aside and all voluntary set-aside in the Spanish regional base area 'Regadio` as  referred to in Commission Regulation (EC) No 1098/94  (3).

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the  Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 10 May 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
